meanings.definition: The act of placing items on shelves.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the shelvings of her books in the library.
meanings.sent2: The store needed more shelvings to display all the products.
meanings.sent3: The shelvings of the toys in the playroom looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library with endless shelvings of memories.
meanings.sent5: The shelvings of the bakery showcased delicious treats.

meanings.sent1: The shelvings in the pantry were filled with canned goods.
meanings.sent2: He built custom shelvings for his garage workshop.
meanings.sent3: The shelvings in the store formed a maze of products.
meanings.sent4: The shelvings in the library stretched from floor to ceiling like a forest of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The shelvings in the kitchen held pots, pans, and spices neatly organized.

meanings.definition: The material used to construct shelves.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter selected sturdy wood for the shelvings.
meanings.sent2: The metal shelvings in the warehouse were durable and practical.
meanings.sent3: She painted the shelvings in bright colors to match the room decor.
meanings.sent4: The glass shelvings added a touch of elegance to the display.
meanings.sent5: The plastic shelvings in the garage were easy to clean and maintain.
